text: Tatoe anata gata gakare (shito) o tasukezu, fushinjin no mono-tachi ga, kare o tsuihō shite mo, arrā wa kanarazu kare o tasuke rareru. Kare wa, tada 1-ri (no dōryō) to, 2-ri de dōkutsu ni ita toki, sono dōryō ni mukatte `shinpai shite wa naranai. Arrā wa watashi-tachi to tomoni ora reru.' To itta sonotoki arrā wa kare no yasuragi o, kare (abū bakuru) ni atae, anata gata ni wa mienaiga,(tenshi no) gunzei de kare o tsuyome rareta. Mata fushin-sha-tachi no kotoba o mottomo hikui mono ni nasa re, arrā no o kotoba o mo takame rareta. Hontōni arrā wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
